title: Set up Third-Party Notification
description: An elderly customer wants to designate their daughter to receive a copy of any disconnection notices.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Collect the name and contact information for the third party (the daughter).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the third party's details.

tasks.description: Add the third party's information to the account with the specific 'disconnection notice' flag.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the account in the CIS.
